modules.description: This module provides functions to convert parsed OPAM file values and entire opamfile structures into string representations, using LF line endings consistently. It operates on the `value` and `opamfile` types defined in the `Ez_opam_file.V1.OpamParserTypes.FullPos` module. These conversions are useful for generating consistent textual output from OPAM file data, such as when writing back modified opam files or displaying their contents programmatically.

This module provides functions to parse OPAM files and values from strings, producing structured representations with positional information. It operates on file names and strings, returning parsed `opamfile` or `value` structures that capture the syntax tree with full position details. It is used to read and analyze OPAM package definitions, enabling tools to process package metadata with precise source location tracking.

This module defines detailed position information for parsing OPAM files, including types like `pos` for tracking file locations and enriched variants of operators and values with positional metadata. It supports structured representation of OPAM file contents, such as `value_kind` for expressions and `opamfile_section` for organizing file items with precise source tracking. It is used for accurately parsing and manipulating OPAM files while retaining full context about the location of each element within the source file.

This module converts parsed OPAM file values and opamfile structures into string representations with LF line endings. It works with the `value` and `opamfile` types from the `FullPos` submodule, enabling consistent output generation for tasks like writing modified opam files or programmatic display of their contents.

Parses OPAM files and values from strings into structured syntax trees with full positional information. Works with file names and string inputs, producing `opamfile` and `value` types that represent package metadata. Used for analyzing and processing OPAM package definitions with precise source location tracking.

This module defines low-level types for parsing OPAM files, including comparison and logical operators, environment update operations, and positional tracking. It works with strings, positions (file name and line/column numbers), and structured values with metadata. It is used to represent and manipulate OPAM file contents with precise source location information during parsing and analysis.

This module provides precise parsing and printing of OPAM files with full positional tracking. It handles structured values, environment updates, and logical operators, working with strings, file positions, and custom syntax trees. Used for modifying, analyzing, or generating OPAM package definitions while preserving source location data.

This module parses and prints OPAM files with precise positional tracking, supporting structured values, environment updates, and logical operators. It operates on custom syntax trees, strings, and file positions to enable accurate manipulation and analysis of OPAM package definitions. Concrete use cases include automated package metadata updates, linting, and generating OPAM files from other configuration formats.
